unit-run

  • GitHub
  • PyPI
  • Forum

Installation

  • Prerequisites
  • Package Installation

User Guide

  • CLI Tool
    • One-time unit running
    • Create a stored Unit for the following runs
    • Run a stored Unit
    • Inspect or view Unit information
    • Set named parameter groups for a stored Unit
    • Delete named parameter groups or the entire Unit for a stored Unit

APIs

  • unit_run.cli
  • unit_run.components
  • unit_run.utils
  • .md

rename_param_group(old_name, new_name, overwrite=False)[source]#
run(group_name)[source]#
_get_param_group_map_dict()[source]#
to_info_dict()[source]#

The information dict for the source unit object

Example:

    print(unit)

{
    "meta": {
        "src_path": "test.py",
        "src_name": "y",
        "load_path": null
    },
    "meta_valid": true,
    "src_valid": false,
    "src_obj_info": null,
    "param_group_map": {
        "name1": {
            "data": [1, 2],
            "load_path": "test/name1.param_group.json",
            "valid": true
        },
        "name2": {
            "data": [10, 1],
            "load_path": "test/name3.param_group.json",
            "valid": true
        }
    }
}
property src_obj_info#
__contains__(group_name)[source]#

Whether group_name in param_group_map of Unit

Parameters:

group_name Target parameter group name

Returns:

Whether group_name in param_group_map of Unit

Example:
    unit = Unit(src_path, src_name)
    print('name1' in unit)
